title: Initialize Python project scaffold
description: Created base project structure, package layout, and dependency metadata.

title: Define core domain models
description: Implemented typed models for company inputs, quant/qual metrics, ranked outputs, and ingestion request/response payloads.

title: Add scoring utility functions
description: Implemented reusable clamp and linear normalization helpers used by scoring engines.

title: Implement quantitative scoring model
description: Built quant scoring over valuation, growth, quality, momentum, and stability with horizon-specific weighting and driver extraction.

title: Implement qualitative scoring model
description: Built qual scoring over management, moat, governance, regulatory risk, and sentiment with horizon-specific weighting and driver extraction.

title: Implement ranking and recommendation logic
description: Composed quant+qual scores into composite score, recommendation banding, and risk notes.

title: Create sample universe for US and India
description: Added mock dataset to bootstrap end-to-end ranking flow.

title: Expose base FastAPI endpoints
description: Added /health, /v1/sample, and /v1/rank endpoints.

title: Add ingestion package and shared HTTP client
description: Created ingestion module boundaries and HTTP helper with configurable user-agent.

title: Implement Yahoo provider for market/fundamental data
description: Added symbol resolution (including India suffix handling), quote summary fetch, and chart close extraction.

title: Implement news sentiment provider
description: Added Google News RSS fetch and lexicon-based headline sentiment scoring.

title: Implement SEC filing signal provider
description: Mapped ticker->CIK and extracted lightweight filing risk indicators from SEC submissions.

title: Build feature mapping from source data to model inputs
description: Converted raw provider values to normalized QuantMetrics and heuristic QualMetrics including momentum/volatility derivation.

title: Implement ingestion orchestration pipeline
description: Connected providers into ingest_targets flow with resilient warnings and partial-failure handling.

title: Expose ingest-and-rank API endpoint
description: Added /v1/ingest-and-rank endpoint that ingests targets, ranks outputs, and returns warnings.

title: Add runnable CLI scripts
description: Added local scripts for sample run and live ingestion run.

title: Add automated tests for scoring and ingestion
description: Added deterministic unit tests for ranking bounds/order and ingestion transformations/warning paths.

title: Document usage and source assumptions
description: Added README quickstart, API examples, data-source notes, and next build steps.

title: Version control and GitHub publishing
description: Created granular commits and pushed repository to GitHub main branch.

title: Add persistent storage for ingested snapshots
description: Store normalized company snapshots and score outputs for reproducibility and historical analysis.

title: Introduce caching and request throttling
description: Cache provider responses with TTL and enforce per-source request pacing to reduce failures and limits.

title: Add retry/backoff and timeout policy per provider
description: Wrap external calls with bounded retries, jittered backoff, and clear error taxonomy.

title: Build NSE/BSE-native filings adapter
description: Integrate India market regulatory disclosures directly instead of relying only on global aggregator fields.
definition_of_done: pipeline routes India targets through adapter

title: Improve sentiment model quality
description: Replace lexicon-only scoring with model-assisted or weighted source sentiment that handles finance context better.

title: Add evidence payload to ranked output
description: Return top evidence items (headlines/filings/date/source) behind positive and negative drivers.

title: Add portfolio construction layer
description: Generate position sizing suggestions with per-stock and sector concentration limits.

title: Add backtesting harness
description: Evaluate score signals over historical periods for US and India and calibrate feature weights by horizon.

title: Introduce configuration management
description: Centralize env/config for providers, thresholds, and risk parameters with typed validation.

title: Add structured logging and request correlation
description: Emit structured logs for ingest/rank path with per-request IDs and provider timings.

title: Add data freshness and completeness checks
description: Detect stale price/fundamental/news inputs and enforce minimum completeness thresholds before ranking.

title: Harden API for production usage
description: Add auth, request limits, and schema-level guardrails for misuse/abuse.

title: Set up CI pipeline
description: Run tests and lint checks on pull requests and main branch pushes.

title: Add containerization and deployment baseline
description: Create Dockerfile and minimal deployment setup for API hosting.

title: Build scheduled ingestion jobs
description: Run periodic ingest for tracked tickers and persist snapshots for longitudinal analysis.

title: Add legal/compliance response guardrails
description: Ensure outputs are explicitly research-only and avoid actionable advisory language in generated recommendations.

title: Create CONTRIBUTING guide and development playbook
description: Document local setup, testing workflow, coding standards, and commit conventions for future contributors.

title: Define initial Jordy UI and interaction direction
description: Captured a chat-first plus structured-analysis interface direction and translated it into executable workstreams.

title: Define user personas and primary jobs-to-be-done
description: Document beginner, intermediate, and advanced investor personas and their top workflows in Jordy.

title: Design conversation intents and response contracts
description: Define supported user intents (analyze stock, compare stocks, sector ideas, risk explain) and required Jordy response sections.
definition_of_done: fallback behavior for missing data defined

title: Create information architecture for Jordy app
description: Define app-level navigation and page hierarchy: dashboard, analysis workspace, ideas table, watchlist, settings.

title: Produce low-fidelity wireframes for core flows
description: Create wireframes for first-run onboarding, analyze flow, compare flow, and watchlist flow.

title: Define UI tokens and component guidelines
description: Set typography, color, spacing, cards, table, and chart token rules to keep UI consistent.

title: Scaffold frontend web app shell
description: Create frontend app with routing, layout scaffold, and environment config for API URL.

title: Implement typed API client for Jordy backend
description: Add client methods for /v1/sample, /v1/rank, and /v1/ingest-and-rank with error handling.

title: Build chat-first Ask Jordy interface
description: Create conversational panel with prompt input, conversation history, and structured response rendering.

title: Build ranked ideas table with filters
description: Create sortable/filterable table for ranked outputs with market, sector, score, and recommendation filters.

title: Build stock detail panel with explainability
description: Show quant/qual breakdown, positives/negatives, risk notes, and evidence sources for selected stock.

title: Implement watchlist management UI
description: Enable adding/removing symbols, pinning priorities, and monitoring score changes over time.

title: Define Jordy prompt templates and tone rules
description: Create reusable response templates for beginner-friendly explanations, confidence notes, and risk disclosures.

title: Add session memory and context stitching
description: Maintain short-term conversation context so follow-up questions reuse prior symbols/horizon assumptions.

title: Add UI integration and E2E tests
description: Cover key user journeys: analyze stock, compare results, inspect risks, and save watchlist.

title: Run usability tests with beginner users
description: Test whether beginners understand recommendations, risks, and next actions from Jordy outputs.

title: Add onboarding tour and empty-state guidance
description: Guide first-time users through choosing market, horizon, and starting prompts.
